title: Ref Block
description: A block referencing a range of text units within a source.

id.description: A short unique identifier to be referenced.

title.description: Optional title for the reference block.

refBlockGenusId.description: Reference ID to the ref block genus.

textSourceId.description: Reference ID to the text source.

startUnitId.description: Reference ID to the starting text unit.

endUnitId.description: Reference ID to the ending text unit.
